news.title: New Survey Finds No. 1 Reason Why Partners Leave Their Firms -- And It’s Not the Most Obvious One
news.description: According to a new survey, the top reason partners leave their law firms is lack of confidence in firm management and strategy.

news.title: Justices Should Consider When Wrongfully Convicted Can Seek Damages, ABA Says
news.description: The ABA filed an amicus brief with the Supreme Court arguing the Court should clarify its rule as to when an individual who was wrongfully convicted may seek damages.

news.title: Tech Company Accused of Bar-Exam Grading Glitch Has No Liability in Test-Takers’ Suit, 11th Circuit Says
news.description: The Eleventh Circuit held that Georgia bar takers who were erroneously told they had failed the bar exam cannot recover damages against the software company that allegedly produced the incorrect scores.

news.title: James Sandman, Innovative LSC Leader and Legal Tech Advocate, to Step Down
news.description: James Sandman, president of the Legal Services Corporation and advocate of the use of technology to enhance access to justice, announced he is stepping down.
